title: - Transportation / Road
description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic and contextual description of a road.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Road

roadClass.description: Property. The classification of this road. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Enum:'motorway, primary, residential, secondary, service, tertiary, trunk, unclassified'.  Allowed values: Those described by [OpenStreetMap](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:highway).

refRoadSegment.description: Property. Road segments which define this road. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Relationship. List of references to entities of type RoadSegment

length.description: Property. Total length of this road in kilometers. Model:'https://schema.org/length'. Units:'Kilometer (Km)'

responsible.description: Property. Responsible for the road i.e. the organism or company in charge of its maintenance. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.
